column1: The project API key can be found in your Usersnap project.

column1: IP restrictions give you the ability to show Usersnap widget only if the user comes with an IP address that is whitelisted.

column2: Eine IP-Adresse oder IP-Range, die freigegeben werden soll, pro Zeile.
